title: Breaking Bad series 5 review: catch up with Jesse and Walt ahead of the new movie El Camino
text:
The Breaking Bad movie sequel El Camino arrives on Netflix on October 11, six long years after the TV series reached its extraordinary conclusion. If your memory of 2013's meth-based action is a little hazy, and you're struggling to recall where Jesse Pinkman ended up, or if Walter White is even alive, don't worry: we have you covered.

Creator Vince Gilligan split the fifth and final series of his drama in two halves, with the second part beginning on August 11 that years and ending with the all-guns-blazing finale Felina, on September 29.

Below are the Telegraph's original, star-rated reviews of all eight episodes. You'll be back up to speed before you can say "Heisenberg". And yes, there...
description: The Breaking Bad movie sequel El Camino arrives on Netflix on October 11, six long years after the TV series reached its extraordinary conclusion.
